profil.title: Profile
profil.subtitle: Manage your avatar and personal informations
profil.alert: If you update your email, you will need to validate it via a verification email

modal.title: My saved searches
modal.no-saved-searches: You have no saved searches yet.

tagline.1: The hub for discovering, remixing and sharing VRChat projects.
tagline.2: Search by name or tag, save alerts and follow new projects easily.

1.title: Search multi-type
1.description: By name or tag to quickly find the right project.

2.title: Personalized alerts
2.description: Save your searches and receive an alert as soon as there is a new project.

3.title: Simplified sharing
3.description: Publish your projects and collaborate with the community.

last-update.title: Last updates
last-update.error-1: Impossible to retrieve updates. Please try again later.
last-update.error-2: Section not configured. Set the NUXT_PUBLIC_GITHUB_OWNER and NUXT_PUBLIC_GITHUB_REPO variables.
